title: "Match Accepted" thing stuck on champion select
body: Can't choose champion because the "Accept Match" thing is all over the screen. Laggy game

replies.body: EUNE seems to be still be having issues after maintenance, but Eambo is posting updates in his[ status thread](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tbyHzasZ-eune-emergency-platform-restart).  Keep an eye on it for now as our network teams continue working on this.
